Events
MQA.EventConstructs a MQA.Event object.
MQA.EventManagerManages event listeners and event handling.
Functions
addListenerRegisters an event handler for a custom event on the source object.

MQA.Event

Constructs a MQA.Event object.

An object representing a non-dom event.  Properties relevant to the specific event are attached as required.

MQA.EventManager

Manages event listeners and event handling.

Note

This class is created automatically and does not need to be instantiated.

Summary
Functions
addListenerRegisters an event handler for a custom event on the source object.
removeListenerRemoves a handler that was installed using addListener()
clearListenersRemoves all handlers on the given object for the given event that were installed using addListener().

Functions

addListener

Registers an event handler for a custom event on the source object.  The event handler will be called with this set to the source object.

Parameters

source(object) The object to attach the event to.
eventType(string) The name of the event to listen for.
handler(string) A string representing the function name to call when the event triggers.
target(unknown) Unknown.

Returns

n/a

See Also

removeListener

removeListener

Removes a handler that was installed using addListener()

Parameters

source(object) The object to remove the event from.
eventType(string) The name of the event to remove the listener for.
handler(string) A string representing the function name set when adding the listener.
target(unknown) Unknown.  Returns: n/a

See Also

addListener

clearListeners

Removes all handlers on the given object for the given event that were installed using addListener().  If event is not specified, removes all handlers on the given object for all events that were installed using addListener().

Parameters

source(object) The object to remove the listeners from
eventType(string) The name of the event to clear.

Returns

n/a

See Also

addListener, removeListener
